org.osmdroid.tileprovider.tilesource

Class FileBasedTileSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osmdroid.tileprovider.tilesource.BitmapTileSourceBase
      • org.osmdroid.tileprovider.tilesource.OnlineTileSourceBase
        • org.osmdroid.tileprovider.tilesource.XYTileSource
          • org.osmdroid.tileprovider.tilesource.FileBasedTileSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITileSource

    public class FileBasedTileSource
extends XYTileSource
    this is an extremely simple tile source that should only be used for offline sources. assumes that the file name matches the source name
    See Also:
    OfflineTileProvider
